name: Flowers -Le volume sur ete-
description: Summer has arrived early to Saint Angraecum Academy, and with it comes change. Follow the story of Erika in the second game in the Flowers series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.6Ghz Single Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 or Greater Resolution DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
